title: Dorothy Of Oz, Volume 2
description: Lost in the wonderful world of Oz, Mara-Shin has acquired some incredible magical powers, as well as some deadly new enemies! In this volume, we go back to the beginning of Mara-Shin's journey and find out how she first gains her transformational powers. Plus, our young heroine encounters the telekinetic human clone Abee - codename: Scarecrow! Mystery, adventure, and more lie along the yellow brick road...
author: Son Hee-Joon
